title: Sony Xperia XZ3: is it an upgrade?
description: Sony announced its latest flagship at IFA 2018, the Xperia XZ3. But aside from a new OLED screen and a few other tweaks and improvements, its not much of an upgrade over the XZ2 model that Sony released earlier this year.
